summary: Adds 2 spells and a Staff to the game
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds 2 spells and a staff to the game.
Conjure Ebony Knight Spell - Adept lvl spell
Conjure Ebony Priest Spell - Expert lvl spell
Staff of Conjure Ebony Priest ( for those who don\\\'t have enough Magicka to summon the Priest )

You can find these in a locked chest close to the Lord Stone ( not far from Mehrune\\\'s Dagon Shrine, check images )
Follow the small path from the Lord Stone ( not far ) just over the hill turn left and follow the mountain ridge
You will know when u find it, it is guarded by 2 Ebony Knights, 1 Ebony Giant and 1 Ebony Priest, the Priest holds the key to the chest ( non of these will respawn once killed )
it should be a tough fight

Should be compatible with all/most mods however i have no idea about mods like SkyRE or other game overhauls that change spells/perks, I use E.R.S.O Unleveled skyrim ( no longer on Nexus,Google it )and it works fine with that, 
i also use Forgotten Magic Redone http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35339//?
and i have encountered no problems

Hope you enjoy, let me know if any problems or if u think they are overpowered/not powerful enough

Credits go to ....
Vicn for his awesome creature resources http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37413//?

jsnider193 for his info and help getting these creatures into the CK/Game, d/l his text document for help getting these creatures into game if u fancy having a go yourself
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37428//?

thx ( if i missed anyone let me know i will edit )

Please don\\\'t upload this mod to any other site without my permission
If u like the mod and would like to translate it, again, please ask for my permission
Because i don\\\'t use SkyRE or other overhauls if you would like to make a patch for these spells then feel free and go ahead, just credit me
Cleaned with TES5Edit ( latest version, i think i did it right )

sorry for the rubbish screenshots, i will update with better soon, feel free to upload your own
author: macdaddy1176

files.name: Summon Ebony Knight and Priest Spells
